items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on product detail and homepage for logged-in users
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within 5 seconds
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline
non_functional: Scalable to handle 1 million concurrent users

notes: User input did not specify recommendation algorithm type, personalization depth, or integration points; assumptions made for general AI-based personalization.
